TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontInfo extends System.Object

span.span: Encapsulates the font properties of text.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来封装文本的字体属性。Use the class to encapsulate the font properties of text. 您可以指定的字体和字体大小。You can specify the font name and font size. 此外可以指定是否为粗体的字体的样式，斜体、 上划线、 删除线，或带下划线。You can also specify whether the style of the font is bold, italic, overlined, strikethrough, or underlined. 此类通常用于在属性中的类需要字体的信息，如属性的类。This class is commonly used in a property for a class that requires font information, such as the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此类没有公共构造函数。This class does not have a public constructor. 不能直接创建类的新实例。A new instance of the class cannot be created directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何修改的属性对象以编程方式来指定的字体属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to modify the properties of a object programmatically to specify the font properties for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

member this.Bold : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示字体是否为粗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is bold.

value.span: 如果字体为粗体，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the font is bold; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定字体为粗体。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font is bold. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式指定粗体的字体中的文本控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a bold font for the text in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将所有 属性重置为未设置状态并清除视图状态。

span.span: Resets all properties to the unset state and clears the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，属性将取消设置创建对象。 properties are unset when the object is created. 首次设置属性，将值添加到视图状态。When a property is first set, the value is added to view state. 方法用来设置所有为取消设置的状态和删除任何项在视图状态属性。The method is used to set all the properties to the unset state and remove any entries in view state. 以下属性被重置：The following properties are reset: - - - - - - - -

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo f) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the font properties to duplicate.

summary.span: 将指定的 的字体属性复制到调用该方法的 类的实例中。

span.span: Duplicates the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法复制指定的字体属性的实例到从中调用此方法的类。Use the method to duplicate the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 中的当前实例的所有属性中关联的属性将替换为类`f`参数。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the associated property in the `f` parameter. 注册一个样式时使用，然后将复制使用，则只属性复制到目标，并非所有的各个属性。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 因此，如果使用的复制中的字体信息属性的的已注册，则不会从样式获得字体的单个设置。Therefore, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法复制的字体属性成属性的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to duplicate the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Combines the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的字体属性组合在一起的实例与从中调用此方法的类。Use the method to combine the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 此方法联接两个属性通过设置未设置的当前实例中每个属性的对象类中的相应属性的值与`f`参数。This method joins the properties of the two objects by setting each property that is not set in the current instance of the class with the value in the corresponding property of the `f` parameter. 尚未设置的属性将被替换。Only properties that have not been set will be replaced. 如果中的属性`f`未设置参数，也不会替换中的当前实例的相应属性类。If a property in the `f` parameter is not set, it will not replace the corresponding property in the current instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法的字体属性组合在一起成属性的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置主要字体名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the primary font name.
The primary font name.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定主要字体名称。Use the property to specify or determine the primary font name. 主要字体名称确定用于与关联的控件中显示文本的字体。The primary font name determines the font that is used to display text in the control associated with the . > [!NOTE] > 当您将设置属性，属性会自动更新中的第一个项属性。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果您设置属性，属性将自动更新为包含的值的单个元素数组属性。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式指定的字体名称控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify the font name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的字体名称为 null。

span.span: The specified font name is null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Names { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.Names : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字体名称的排序数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an ordered array of font names.
An ordered array of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定的字体名称的有序的数组。Use the property to specify or determine an ordered array of font names for a . 属性通常用于存储的可用字体名称的列表。The property is commonly used to store a list of available font names. > [!NOTE] > 当您将设置属性，属性会自动更新中的第一个项属性。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果您设置属性，属性将自动更新为包含的值的单个元素数组属性。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. 若要指定的字体名称使用数组中设置到你想要使用的字体名称的数组中的第一个元素。To specify the font name for the using the array, set the first element in the array to the font name you want to use. 由于属性会自动更新时属性设置，您需要处理数组而不是设置数组中的项的顺序重新排列直接属性。Since the property is automatically updated when the property is set, you need to manipulate the array to rearrange the order of the items in the array instead of setting the property directly. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

value.span: 如果字体带上划线，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the font is overlined; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定字体是否包含文本上方的行。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line above the text. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 生成的链接的字体下划线行为， ，并设置受影响控件属性控件。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果属性设置，而不考虑值它的值，则必须设置属性显式如果你想要显示为带有下划线的链接。If the property is set, regardless of value its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式指定的文本中的带上划线的字体控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify an overlined font for the text in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定字体是否包含文本行中的。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line through the text. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 生成的链接的字体下划线行为， ，并设置受影响控件属性控件。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果属性设置，而不考虑其值，则必须设置属性显式如果你想要显示为带有下划线的链接。If the property is set, regardless of its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式指定的删除线字体控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a strikethrough font for a control.
